descriptions.description: The GIFLIB project maintains the giflib service library, which has been pulling images out of GIFs since 1989.
Das GIFLIB-Projekt kümmert sich um die giflib-Bibliothek, welche seit 1989 Bilder aus GIF-Dateien extrahiert.

set.commands: export PACKAGE_NAME=giflib export PACKAGE_VERSION=5.0.4 oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract giflib-5.0.4.tar.bz2 oegpatch 001 # mingw doesn't have mkstemp(), replaced by mktemp() configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive giflib-5.0.4
